name: One Death Seven Deaths
description:
Switch back and forth between ancient past and modern present while you play as one of the hero twins, two adventurers on the run from lords of the underworld Hun-Came (one death) and Vucub-Came (seven deaths). 

  • Beat platforming challenges 
  • Solve environmental puzzles 
  • Travel through time 

Be warned, to escape successfully you must ensure that both you and your sibling evade the grasp of Hun-Came and Vucub-Came... Or else be sent to Xibalba!

Character art/animations and environment art by Alistair Sumstad, scripting by Olivia Elmers, systems/level design and music by Elian Sweeten. All sound effects are in the public domain.
